numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This is Wednesday's live moderation of "What’s Going On in This Graph?".
2. Today's graph displays how frequently young adults communicate with their parents.
3. The data does not include young adults who do not communicate with their parents.
4. From 9 am to 2 pm E.T. today, you can share your responses online.
5. You can share responses for four questions.
6. If a notice includes a claim then the notice must include evidence that supports the claim.
7. By Friday morning, we will reveal a free link to the online article that included this graph.
8. By Friday morning, we will also give shout outs for some catchy headlines.
9. You can get a link to your response.
10. You can share the link with your teacher.
11. You can share the link with your classmates.
12. You can get the link by clicking the response box below your response.
13. You can click "Email me when my comment is published".
14. There is one more graph in this school year.
15. This graph will be released by Friday, May 3.
16. The topic of this graph is hotter summers.
